products.name: UltraSound Pro Headphones
products.description: Premium noise-canceling wireless headphones with 40-hour battery life, adaptive EQ, and spatial audio support. Features memory foam ear cushions and a lightweight titanium frame.

products.name: SmartDock 4K Hub
products.description: Universal USB-C docking station with dual 4K HDMI output, 100W passthrough charging, Gigabit Ethernet, and 4 USB-A ports. Compatible with all major laptop brands.

products.name: ErgoRise Standing Desk Mat
products.description: Anti-fatigue mat designed for standing desks with 3/4 inch cushion, beveled edges, and a built-in massage ridge. Made from sustainable recycled materials.

products.name: PixelPerfect 27" Monitor
products.description: 27-inch 4K IPS display with 99% sRGB coverage, USB-C input with 65W charging, built-in KVM switch, and adjustable ergonomic stand with height, tilt, and swivel.

products.name: MechType Elite Keyboard
products.description: Compact 75% mechanical keyboard with hot-swappable switches, per-key RGB, wireless tri-mode connectivity, and a 4000mAh battery. CNC aluminum case with sound-dampening foam.

products.name: AirCharge Pad Duo
products.description: Dual wireless charging pad supporting up to 15W fast charge per device. Charges phone and earbuds simultaneously with intelligent power distribution.

products.name: StreamCam Ultra
products.description: 4K webcam with auto-framing, dual noise-canceling microphones, and a built-in ring light with adjustable color temperature. Includes magnetic privacy shutter.

products.name: PowerVault 20K Portable Battery
products.description: 20,000mAh portable battery pack with 100W USB-C PD output, dual USB-A ports, and a built-in LED display showing remaining charge. Airline-approved capacity.
